name: HealthSpark
headline: Launch and run an AI-native physical therapy practice
description: HealthSpark empowers physical therapists to launch and run an AI-native independent practice by automating admin tasks like insurance, scheduling, handling calls and texts, and charting.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:health-tech; industry:digital-health; industry:healthcare; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Stephen Grinich, CEO & Co-Founder
founders.description: Stephen is a software engineer building at the intersection of healthcare and AI, previously at Rad AI and 98point6. Holds a Master of Translational Medicine degree from UC Berkeley and UCSF, with a focus on health tech entrepreneurship at Berkeley Haas, and studied Computer Science at Carleton College. Now building HealthSpark to empower independent healthcare providers.

founders.name: Jonah Tuchow, CTO and Co-Founder
founders.description: Jonah was an early engineer at Doctor on Demand, where he was a founding member of the revenue cycle management team. His high-impact contributions helped support the company’s rapid growth and eventual merger with Grand Rounds.

# Start and grow your own physical therapy practice
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67ae6e09ff8b32c51e0fa6d7_document-text-svgrepo-com.svg)
Insurance credentialing
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67ae6e4e35b978ff6aac44df_stars-minimalistic-svgrepo-com.svg)
Easy claims submission and billing
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67ae6edf8ad8e264667a86ee_laptop-minimalistic-svgrepo-com.svg)
All-in-one EHR
[Join our network](https://www.joinhealthspark.com/<#apply>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67aeeaf6447684508aaf42bd_header-photo.jpg)
Start accepting
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/673c2e376969f9e627d698cb_blueshieldbluecxross.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/673c2e376969f9e627d698cc_aetna.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/673c2e376969f9e627d698cd_united.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/673c2e376969f9e627d698ca_cigna.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/673c2e376969f9e627d698ce_anthem.svg)
+ More
### Welcome to private practice made easy
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67882955c822ef7ecabe7830_front%20page.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67ae875fa498f564e959483e_dashboard-alt-svgrepo-com.svg)
### Dashboard
Get an all-in-one view into your schedule, clients, chats, payouts, and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67ae877c16af12d0efba6171_calendar-svgrepo-com.svg)
### Scheduling
Schedule appointments directly on the calendar and manage your schedule alongside other personal commitments.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67ae879baf8768222cd8a4fc_chat-dots-svgrepo-com.svg)
### Secure Messaging
Exchange messages and files with clients securely, ensuring privacy via HIPAA-compliant communication.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67ae6edf8ad8e264667a86ee_laptop-minimalistic-svgrepo-com.svg)
### EHR
Gather intake questionnaires, review client information, and complete charting notes, all in one place. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67ae87c86b47acf08cc552ce_card-billing-svgrepo-com.svg)
### Billing & Payments
Submit your charting notes and update the appointment status, and our billing team will take care of the claims.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67ae87e53e0fe9f694250d3f_phone-calling-svgrepo-com.svg)
### Virtual Receptionist
Handles scheduling, questions about your practice, and more, 24/7.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67ae8808af4fad63b5547398_group-svgrepo-com.svg)
### Marketing
Receive referrals from online directories and nearby providers at no cost to you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67ae8841acbdbe88084057d3_health-svgrepo-com.svg)
### Insurance
Get credentialed with all the major insurance with just one simple application
### Apply to partner with HealthSpark
Schedule a call in less than a minute
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67ae8ad79f487fe119c121ca_iStock-1214822053.jpg)
### How it works
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67aea40426ee61d1e15016ae_one-open-svgrepo-com.svg)
### Apply today
Meet with our team to see if HealthSpark is the right match for you.
[Join our network ->](https://www.joinhealthspark.com/<#apply>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67aea423e7dbd7f3e86b1bdf_two-open-svgrepo-com.svg)
### Get credentialed
Submit your credentialing form and we'll get you in-network with local insurance providers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/67aea32bcccc422f0451a905_three-open-svgrepo-com.svg)
### Grow your private practice
Start seeing clients through HealthSpark in as little as 30 days, or as soon as you are in-network.
### Frequently Asked Questions
###### What is HealthSpark?
We are a multi-state network of licensed physical therapists, dedicated to helping independent PTs succeed while empowering people to move better, recover faster, and live healthier lives.
###### Will I be an employee of HealthSpark?
Physical therapists use the HealthSpark platform to build and expand their own private practices. You’re in charge: running your own business, setting your schedule, and working on your terms, not as an employee. At tax time, you’ll receive a 1099 form from HealthSpark to file as an independent contractor.
###### Does this impact my existing clients?
No! HealthSpark will not restrict your current practice, but help it expand. Credentialing through HealthSpark will not restrict your ability to see self-pay clients under your own tax ID.
###### What is the commitment?
There is no minimum hour commitment to join. We are here to support you, not dictate how you practice.
###### How long does it take to set up?
On average, you’ll be able to start seeing clients on HealthSpark within 1-4 months. If you have previously been in-network, the credentialing process can often be expedited.
###### Is there a contract I need to sign?
Yes, you’ll need to sign credentialing documents, agree to our terms of service agreement for providers, and sign a standard independent contractor agreement.
###### Is there a cost to join?
No, it's completely free to join HealthSpark.
###### Do you support telehealth or home health providers? 
Yes, you can see patients however you see fit, whether via telehealth, home health, mobile health, or a typical brick and mortar clinic. 
###### How do I get new clients?
HealthSpark helps you access new clients and grow your caseload through online advertising, physician referrals, and more. We encourage you to explore self sourcing as well so you can grow your caseload alongside our efforts.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/6736e20eb686c25549304778_Transparent%20Logo%20No%20Padding.png)](https://www.joinhealthspark.com/</>)
[![Ecommerce Webflow Template - Poppins](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7bfb/6736ce2ddafc89ffd84d7d30_66c42679a0a118c60d5ea081_LinkedIN.svg)](https://www.joinhealthspark.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/health-spark/>)[](https://www.joinhealthspark.com/<https:/x.com/joinhealthspark>)

generated_description:
Welcome to HealthSpark—a company that’s reimagining physical therapy using AI. Founded in 2024 and proudly part of Y Combinator's Batch F24, HealthSpark is based in San Francisco. With a lean team of two, they’re on a mission to empower physical therapists to create and manage their own independent, AI-driven practices efficiently.

So, what does that look like? HealthSpark takes the pain out of practice management by handling the administrative drudgery—insurance credentialing, scheduling, call management, and charting—allowing therapists to focus on what they do best: helping patients recover and thrive. Their platform includes an AI-native Electronic Health Record (EHR) and a Call Inbox, making it easier for practitioners to keep their operations smooth and client-focused.

Dalton Caldwell, a seasoned partner, is a guiding force behind this innovative venture. It’s no wonder HealthSpark has resonated with those in the health tech space—they’re merging cutting-edge artificial intelligence with essential healthcare services to improve patient outcomes.

Imagine starting your own practice with minimal hassle. HealthSpark's offerings include a comprehensive dashboard for clients, secure messaging, billing management, and even marketing support to attract new clients. It’s a refreshing take on traditional practice management, putting control firmly in the therapists' hands, while providing all the tools they need to be successful.

Worried about existing clients? HealthSpark won’t constrain your current practice; it's designed to enhance and grow it. And the best part? There’s no cost to join. It’s all about creating a supportive network for licensed physical therapists—whether they want to see clients in-person, through telehealth, or even in a home health setting.

All this is a mere scratch of the surface. If you're intrigued and want to dive deeper, visit [HealthSpark’s website](https://www.joinhealthspark.com) and explore how they’re making private practice easier and more rewarding for therapists everywhere.
